original_text: And the border was drawn from the top of the hill unto the fountain of the water of Nephtoah, and went out to the cities of mount Ephron; and the border was drawn to Baalah, which is Kirjathjearim:
korean_text: 또 이 산 꼭대기에서부터 넵도아 샘물까지 이르러 에브론 산 성읍들로 나아가고 또 바알라 곧 기럇 여아림으로 접어들며

sentences.original_text: from the top of the hill
unto the fountain of the water of Nephtoah
and went out to the cities of mount Ephron
and the border was drawn to Baalah
